TopProjects.ProjectDescription: Productivity is an Android App that helps you keep track of your daily tasks. You can add task entries or projects and choose badge color. Adding projects allows you to keep track of all tasks for a specific project. *Dark Theme/Light Theme Availability*

Car Rental Android App which has User and Admin view. Admin can add vehicles and categories. Users can then browse through categories and choose vehicle of their choice by providing their information. Once booking is complete, they view the total cost, rental rate, etc...
Competitive Autonomous Soccer Robot which can find the ball and score a goal. It is also capable of doing complex tasks such as navigation, finding opponents and preventing goals.

It's an RPG Dungeon Type game where the main objective is to explore all the regions and capture all the slimes. Along the way, you discover new places and items(keys to unlock chests and doors, coins), and use these to help you find all the slimes.
